entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 8.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022
